title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 1, ch. II, subch. C, pt. 77 - Standards For The Care Of Seized Dogs
content:

State Regulations
§ 77.1 - Definitions
§ 77.2 - Standards for the care of seized dogs
§ 77.3 - Euthanasia and disposal
§ 77.4 - Access and inspection
§ 77.5 - Dog dealer prohibited from appointment as dog control officer

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 1, ch. II, subch. C, pt. 77

Statutory authority: Agriculture and Markets Law, §§18, 126; L. 1978, ch. 220, § 3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
